creator: YeeZa
notes: This training pack will help you improve your reflexes and mechanical skills when making saves.Most saves are pretty straight forward but here are a few tips: 1, Aim to clear the ball low to the corner 2, Use fast aerials to save the quick shots 3, Try to reflect the ball away from the goal, rather than directly blocking it. If you hit the ball back towards the same direction it came then you will likely kill the speed of the ball, which often leads to the opponent scoring. 4, Also make sure not to hit the ball directly into the ceiling as this will often end in a bad result during a real game. 5, Use this training pack to create good habits as a goalie and remember to have fun!
